column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Excellent. We chose Bosscat for a dinner for 49-50 people as part of a wedding celebration. Comments from the attendees were uniformly positive - food
column4: I very much appreciated the attention to detail and deliciousness of the appetizer
column8: and beef ribs. The desserts - chocolate churros
column10: and hot chocolate with add ins were yummy.
